In his lab greenhouse at Emory University in Atlanta, Jacobus ‚ÄúJaap‚Äù de Roode uses glue to attach mature monarch butterfly chrysalises to a milkweed plant, which they feed on after they emerge. He keeps populations of monarchs in captivity to study how the Ophryocystis elektroscirrha parasite hurts their ability to metamorphose properly.
